Last War:Survival.releaseNotes:
1. Gift level cap increased to Level 25, with new dynamic emotes and Avatar Frame rewards added.
2. Optimized the interface display of Arena [Battle Record] to more clearly show defense and win/loss information.

Candy Crush Saga.releaseNotes:
We hope you’re having fun playing Candy Crush Saga! 

We update the game every week with sweet new features, exciting levels, and important bug fixes to keep everything running smoothly. 

Don't forget to download the latest version for the best experience!

New to the game? Don’t be shy, join the fun!

Clash Royale.releaseNotes:
New update: CLASH-O-WEEN IS BACK!
• NEW EVOLUTIONS:
• Skeleton Army – A General rises to lead the swarm.
• Royal Ghost – Summons Souldiers to fight by his side.
• NEW LUCKY CHESTS: Special Chests packed with seasonal content - Cards, Cosmetics, and Evolution Shards.
• MERGE TACTICS: New Rulers enter the Arena and the roster expands with powerful Troops like Wizard, Witch, Electro Wizard, and more.
• Plus, bug fixes and improvements to keep battles running smoothly

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!
3. New Feature: Mood Status. Set a status to let others know how you're feeling, making social interactions more fun and personal.

Pokémon GO.releaseNotes: Trainers, we hope you’re enjoying your adventure in Pokémon GO! We update the app regularly with new events and features, so make sure to check the in-game News to stay up to date.

Whiteout Survival.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT:Visit the Dark Zone and unlock the Howling Factory! Join Sam, Colton and Harrison as they're transported to a strange nightmare world. Help them escape by collecting points and unlock exclusive decorations to complete the event.

Play Royal Kingdom now!Get ready for a gorgeous new update!

• Prepare yourself for 100 NEW LEVELS! Experience fun and exciting challenges!

• Unlock the latest item, MOSAIC TILES! When the tiles start to crack, what’s beneath comes right back!

Play Royal Kingdom now!

Season Adventures

Dark War:Survival.releaseNotes:
[Optimization & Adjustments]
- After canceling the Bio-Mutant's Engage Offline function, a pop-up notification will be added.

Love and Deepspace.releaseNotes:
Love and DeepSpace – New Version [Heartbeats Ablaze] is now open!

[Brand New 5-Star Memories]
The limited-time event [Heartbeats Ablaze] is now open! Collect series Memories and, upon meeting certain conditions, receive an exclusive BGM for free. You can also earn rewards such as Deepspace Wish: Limited, Event Memory-Themed Outfit, and selectable Event-Limited 5-Star Memory and other Cumulative Wish Rewards!
 
[Limited-Time Events]
- The limited-time event [Evernit Meloride] is now open! Let the music guide you as you embark on a journey through the Polar Night City. Participate to receive Deepspace Wish: Limited, New Accessories, Photo Poses, Exclusive Title, Journal Items, and more rewards for Free!
- The [Nightbeat Gift] event is now open! Claim multiple rewards for free, and unlock more valued packs for even greater bonuses. [Dazzle Decor Sets] are also available at a limited-time discount. Purchase the pack and enjoy your exclusive dazzling stage!
- New Outfits will be available for a limited time on November 7, with last year's trendy costumes returning for a limited period. Don't miss this annual special: unlock a new outfit at a special price!
 
[System Upgrades]
- [Affinity] Cap Increase—more heartwarming moments with him are waiting to be unlocked!
- [With Him - Decor] now features 3D preview functionality—revisit the unforgettable times you've shared together.
- [Your Cat Misses You] widget now has dynamic expressions for more cute and heartwarming interactions.
- Memory System search and sorting functions upgraded—easier, more precise filtering makes your Memories always within reach.

Age of Origins:Tower Defense.releaseNotes: Optimized some of the game play.

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Descend into uncharted depths with Call of Duty®: Mobile’s Season 7: Phantom Current! Unearth the secrets of the abyss and encounter CODM’s sixth Mythic Operator, Dark Shepherd, a special crossover with Girls’ Frontline, and a refreshed Legendary reward in the Secret Cache system. 

New Mythic Dark Shepherd: 
Unleash darkness with the most sinister Mythic Operator yet, Dark Shepherd – Phantom. Wield the Epic Scythe and Legendary AS-VAL to dominate the lobby with forces from another dimension. With power coursing through your veins, every fight becomes a surge of unstoppable force. 

New Secret Cache Reward: 
Another Legendary weapon skin is landing in the Secret Cache system! Log in and play to start earning the RUS-79U – Mystical Lamp… before it vanishes in a puff of smoke—and no genie can bring it back. 
 
Girls’ Frontline: 
Girls’ Frontline deploys into Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 7! Recruit an iconic T-Doll Operator and gear up with exclusive themed items. Complete the seasonal event to de-stress, reload, and reinforce your squad with free Girls’ Frontline rewards. 

New Battle Passes:  
Season 7 brings an all-new Battle Pass and the opportunity to earn 50 tiers of free and premium rewards, including the new MG 82 weapon and Bomb Drone Scorestreak! Gear up and stay the course—more treasures await you in the Season 8 Battle Pass! 

New Battle Pass Vaults:    
Fan-favorite Battle Passes are setting sail once again in the Vault for Seasons 7 and 8—don’t miss your chance to rearm with gear from past deployments! Season 7 brings Season 11: Ultimate Frontier (2022) and Season 7: Heat Wave (2023) back on deck. Hold steady—more cargo is charted for arrival in Season 8! 

Major Gameplay Updates: 
Season 7 shifts into high gear with all-new gameplay updates for a fresh dose of chaos! Get ready to burn rubber in Mini Mayhem, where you’ll zip around the map battling for first place in an RCXD. And for the first time ever, CODM Battle Royale gets its own Gulag—fight your way back from elimination in a gritty 1v1 showdown on ‘Isolated’. 

From deep-sea secrets to Mythic mayhem, Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7: Phantom Current plunges you into a fresh experience. The current’s pulling you in—so gear up and dive headfirst into the action!

Foundation: Galactic Frontier.releaseNotes:
This update focuses on improving combat mechanics and overall gaming experience. The key adjustments are as follows:

1. [War Frenzy] Mechanism Adjustments
• Fleets that initiate attacks against other traders will enter the [War Frenzy] status, gaining increased Attack and applying a Slow effect to targets. Fleets in this status cannot teleport, be recalled, or be repaired. The duration resets if the status is triggered again.
• Leaving a rally or garrison during War Frenzy will temporarily prevent you from rejoining.
• Removed the special War Frenzy and Slow effect when flanked in the "Disciple Hunting Grounds" event. Future events will now uniformly apply the standard [War Frenzy] mechanics.

2. Port Garrison Improvements
• Garrisoned fleets now have a default Defense bonus.
• When any fleet garrisoned at a Port triggers [War Frenzy], all fleets garrisoned at that Port will receive the [War Frenzy] bonus.

3. New [Home Port Logistics] Feature
• When not engaged in combat, fleets at your Home Port reduce Major Damage over time.

4. Reporting System Launch
• You can now report in-game violations such as inappropriate names, custom avatars, and chat content.

5. Daily Quest Simplification
• Reduced progress requirements, making rewards easier to obtain.

6. Visual Enhancements
• Optimized certain visual assets and UI elements to improve the overall experience.

Roblox.releaseNotes: To make Roblox work better for you, we deliver updates regularly. These updates include bug fixes and improvements for speed and reliability.

Fortnite.releaseNotes:
Mobile Optimization
We’re continuing our efforts to make it faster and easier to jump into Fortnite!
With v38.00, Blitz Royale is now the only experience included in new installs, letting you get into the action quicker and play your way. You can also play and update creator-made islands without waiting for other experiences to download or update. That way, you can choose when to download experiences like Battle Royale, Creative, Reload, OG, LEGO Fortnite, Rocket Racing or Fortnite Festival - keeping the initial install smaller.

Fortnite | Simpsons
Springfield is the Island in the new Battle Royale Season! Unlock Homer, Marge, and more in the Battle Pass.

Get a Trusty Sidekick
Unlock the first Sidekick in Fortnite, Peels, in the Battle Pass. Sidekicks tag along with you!

a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Disney Solitaire.releaseNotes:
Get ready for an amazing update!
* Prepare for NEW levels!
* Unlock NEW Disney characters!
* Join the magic with NEW DISNEY FEATURES!
* Enjoy performance improvements for a smoother gaming experience!
Play Disney Solitaire!

Last War:Survival.releaseNotes:

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!

Imposter - Party Word Game.releaseNotes: New: Optional hint word for the Imposter. Helps them get away - can you still spot them?

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Descend into uncharted depths with Call of Duty®: Mobile’s Season 7: Phantom Current! Unearth the secrets of the abyss and encounter CODM’s sixth Mythic Operator, Dark Shepherd, a special crossover with Girls’ Frontline, and a refreshed Legendary reward in the Secret Cache system. 

New Mythic Dark Shepherd: 
Unleash darkness with the most sinister Mythic Operator yet, Dark Shepherd – Phantom. Wield the Epic Scythe and Legendary AS-VAL to dominate the lobby with forces from another dimension. With power coursing through your veins, every fight becomes a surge of unstoppable force. 

New Secret Cache Reward: 
Another Legendary weapon skin is landing in the Secret Cache system! Log in and play to start earning the RUS-79U – Mystical Lamp… before it vanishes in a puff of smoke—and no genie can bring it back. 
 
Girls’ Frontline: 
Girls’ Frontline deploys into Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 7! Recruit an iconic T-Doll Operator and gear up with exclusive themed items. Complete the seasonal event to de-stress, reload, and reinforce your squad with free Girls’ Frontline rewards. 

New Battle Passes:  
Season 7 brings an all-new Battle Pass and the opportunity to earn 50 tiers of free and premium rewards, including the new MG 82 weapon and Bomb Drone Scorestreak! Gear up and stay the course—more treasures await you in the Season 8 Battle Pass! 

New Battle Pass Vaults:    
Fan-favorite Battle Passes are setting sail once again in the Vault for Seasons 7 and 8—don’t miss your chance to rearm with gear from past deployments! Season 7 brings Season 11: Ultimate Frontier (2022) and Season 7: Heat Wave (2023) back on deck. Hold steady—more cargo is charted for arrival in Season 8! 

Major Gameplay Updates: 
Season 7 shifts into high gear with all-new gameplay updates for a fresh dose of chaos! Get ready to burn rubber in Mini Mayhem, where you’ll zip around the map battling for first place in an RCXD. And for the first time ever, CODM Battle Royale gets its own Gulag—fight your way back from elimination in a gritty 1v1 showdown on ‘Isolated’. 

From deep-sea secrets to Mythic mayhem, Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7: Phantom Current plunges you into a fresh experience. The current’s pulling you in—so gear up and dive headfirst into the action!

Color Block Jam.releaseNotes: New look, same fun! We’ve refreshed our game icon, so you’ll spot us more easily on your home screen. Get ready to take your skills to the next level with our LATEST NEW OBSTACLE! This update introduces the COLORFUL CRATE and FRESH NEW LEVELS! Colorful crates are cleared once all blocks of the same color are removed from the board. Watch carefully which colors you have, plan your moves wisely, and clear your path with perfect timing! Strategy, timing, and precision will decide your success. Don’t miss the new update!

Block Crush！.releaseNotes: This update brings performance improvements and a smoother gameplay experience.

Clash of Clans.releaseNotes:
Rank Up!
·   Multiplayer split! Join Tournaments and climb new Leagues in Ranked Battles, or duke it out in regular Battles without the risk of losing Trophies.

·   Shields have switched up! Introducing Magic Shields that protect resources and Legend Shields that skip upcoming League Days.
·   Other Changes: We’re reworking Spring Traps and removing Town Hall Weapon Levels.

寒霜啟示錄.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Meanwhile—It's Mischief time! Head to the Cackling Crab to solve puzzles and surprise friends.

嘟嘟臉惡作劇.releaseNotes:
Pre-download begins on October 8th（UTC+9）, official service starts on October 9th（UTC+9）!
Launch celebration rewards are here! Log in now to claim them!

點點大作戰.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
- [Wilderness Map] exploration gameplay opens a brand-new map [A Night at the Museum]. Update to the latest version to immediately experience more exciting storylines and collect exquisite decorative buildings!

- After reaching a certain progress in [Expedition] mode, the new [Quick Raid] feature will be unlocked.. If your formation can easily defeat enemies in multiple upcoming stages, you can use this feature to complete several stages at once and receive the corresponding rewards.

- Rosie’s exclusive showcase [Neon Stage] is now available in the shelter! Chiefs can unlock this decoration and watch Rosie’s stunning performance after purchasing the [1st Buy] bundle. Players who have already purchased the [1st Buy] bundle will automatically unlock [Neon Stage] after updating to the latest version and can manually place it.

[Optimizations & Fixes]
- Hero Signature Weapon Optimization:
1. Signature Weapon level cap increased from 6 to 15, providing extraordinary power to your heroes!
- Each hero’s Signature Weapon now has its own unique skill, which will further enhance at levels 10 and 15, granting even stronger bonuses!

- Hero Gear Reforge Optimization:
1. Added more types of attributes obtainable through reforging.
2. After this update, all Reforge Hammers consumed by Chiefs before 00:00 UTC on October 30 will be returned via mail. (This will not affect the current reforge progress of Chiefs.)
3. Further user experience improvements for Gear Reforging will be implemented in future updates.

- Major Hero System Upgrade:
1. Added a [Faction] tag on top of existing hero classes. 
2. Multiple heroes have received class adjustments and skill enhancements. 

- [Underground Goldmine] Event Optimization:
1. Cross-server matching added, allowing you to explore this opportunity- and challenge-filled underground alongside Chiefs from different States!
2. Added a gathering leaderboard, which tracks the total gold acquired by each Chief in a round through mining, plundering, and revenge, with generous ranking rewards!
3. After the update, the number of minefields per layer will dynamically adjust based on the current mining progress of that layer, allowing Chiefs to more quickly view and select target mines.

- Adjusted the size of some decorative buildings to better display your collection. Due to these size changes, all decorations will temporarily revert to an unplaced state after the update (no effect on attribute bonuses). Chiefs can reposition them according to preference.

- Chat Optimizations:
1. Private chat limit increased to 100 users.
2. Maximum chat message length increased to 1000 characters.
3. Season chat channels will not close immediately after the season ends but will remain open until new season matchmaking is completed.

- Optimized the custom avatar upload process in Chief info, adding a status display for “Avatar Under Review.”

12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.

八零找茬.releaseNotes: Optimize gameplay experience and fix game issues

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!
3. New Feature: Mood Status. Set a status to let others know how you're feeling, making social interactions more fun and personal.

不用網路的遊戲 - 無網路遊戲 - 離線 遊戲 - 無網遊戲.releaseNotes:
• Added support for playing vs 2/3 bots in Ludo
• Bug fixes and improvements

緋聞港口：合併&故事.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT:Visit the Dark Zone and unlock the Howling Factory! Join Sam, Colton and Harrison as they're transported to a strange nightmare world. Help them escape by collecting points and unlock exclusive decorations to complete the event.

Top Tycoon: Coin Theme Empire.releaseNotes:
1. We’ve fixed bugs for a smoother gaming experience!
2. And added new exciting content.

Keep your game updated to enjoy all the great features!

If you’re enjoying "Top Tycoon," we’d love to hear your thoughts! :)

Roblox.releaseNotes: To make Roblox work better for you, we deliver updates regularly. These updates include bug fixes and improvements for speed and reliability.

Royal Kingdom.releaseNotes:
Play Royal Kingdom now!Get ready for a gorgeous new update!

• Prepare yourself for 100 NEW LEVELS! Experience fun and exciting challenges!

• Unlock the latest item, MOSAIC TILES! When the tiles start to crack, what’s beneath comes right back!

• Defeat the new enemy, CACTUS! Looks like it’s gone for a while, then it pops up on another tile!

• Partner up for the new event, HIDDEN PATH! Prove that teamwork’s might can quell the Dark Witch’s spell!

• Explore the new district, MONORAIL! Keep expanding the kingdom to discover new horizons!

Play Royal Kingdom now!

Pikmin Bloom.releaseNotes:
Thanks for playing Pikmin Bloom! New in this version:

- Minor improvements and bug fixes.

*Please download the latest version of the app from the store for the changes above to be reflected.

Dark War:Survival.releaseNotes:
[Optimization & Adjustments]
- After canceling the Bio-Mutant's Engage Offline function, a pop-up notification will be added.
- When tapping an alliance that has been disbanded in the Rankings, a pop-up notification will now indicate that the alliance has been disbanded.
- Optimized some in-game visuals and details.

Travel Town - Merge Adventure.releaseNotes:
Welcome to the latest update of Travel Town!
We’ve been busy improving the game and addressing bugs for you. 
Enjoy!

夢想小鎮 (Township).releaseNotes:
Get ready for a new update!
New adventures in Township!

Season Adventures
* Gatsby-era fashion and medieval nobility are coming to Township! Decorate your town and win valuable resources in the Gatsby Pass and Knight Pass!

Thrilling new expeditions
* While searching for traces of Vikings, Richard and Rachel end up captured by them and must fight off a mysterious monster!
* Richard, Ellen, and Alicia take part in filming an exciting Thanksgiving TV show!

New card collection
* Collect cards from the Winter Collection to get a unique badge and other prizes!

Also
* Halloween and Black Friday sales
* Travel to Loch Ness and Santa's home in new regatta seasons!
* Enjoy new buildings—a yoga center and a spiral complex!

Dice Dreams™.releaseNotes:
Thanks for playing Dice Dreams! We are working hard to improve the game with every release.

In this version, we've added a variety of updates and improvements to enhance your experience.

We hope you enjoy the game!

Pokémon GO.releaseNotes: Trainers, we hope you’re enjoying your adventure in Pokémon GO! We update the app regularly with new events and features, so make sure to check the in-game News to stay up to date.

Clash Royale.releaseNotes:
New update: CLASH-O-WEEN IS BACK!
• NEW EVOLUTIONS:
• Skeleton Army – A General rises to lead the swarm.
• Royal Ghost – Summons Souldiers to fight by his side.
• NEW LUCKY CHESTS: Special Chests packed with seasonal content - Cards, Cosmetics, and Evolution Shards.
• MERGE TACTICS: New Rulers enter the Arena and the roster expands with powerful Troops like Wizard, Witch, Electro Wizard, and more.
• Plus, bug fixes and improvements to keep battles running smoothly

野蠻生存錄：侏羅紀.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. SVIP3+ players can send images after updating the game (limits apply).
2. New Tree Ornament available.

[Optimizations & Adjustments]
1. Akaham Rush: New timing is Friday UTC 12:00.
2. Auto-Hunt: Added battle predictions for top-level Wildlings.
3. Auction Harbor: Gems and Aurelith Core usage won't count in events.

[Other Changes]
1. Pop-ups for building upgrades.
2. Removed custom notes in coordinates sharing.
3. Improved event shortcuts and prompts.
